comments.body: @S11001001 This drastically improve performance, please confirm you do not see issue.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@  // do *not* use implicitly unless type `LanguageMinorVersion` becomes
  // indexed by the enclosing major version's singleton type --SC
  final val minorVersionOrdering: Ordering[LanguageMinorVersion] =
    Ordering.by(acceptedVersions.zipWithIndex.toMap)
